stimulusHtml: If 0< b n < a n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCB@ for n≥1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaWGUbGaeyyzImRaaGymaaaa@3988@ , which of the following must be true?
choicesHtml: If lim n→∞ a n =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41C3@ , then ∑ n=1 ∞ b n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ converges.

If ∑ n = 1 ∞ a n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ converges, then lim n → ∞ b n = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41C3@ .

If ∑ n=1 ∞ b n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ diverges, then lim n → ∞ a n = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41C3@ .

If ∑ n = 1 ∞ a n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ diverges, then ∑ n=1 ∞ b n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ diverges

If ∑ n=1 ∞ b n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ converges, then ∑ n = 1 ∞ a n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@ converges
